title: aten_op in Caffe2 doesn't recompile correctly when operator signature changes
body_html:
Steps to reproduce:

  1. Build Caffe2 (e.g., with python setup_caffe2.py develop) at def3715
  2. Apply 6a55238 Grid sampler: nearest interpolation & reflection padding (#10051) and rebuild

Actual result:

./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:8536:75: error: too few arguments to function ‘at::Tensor at::grid_sampler
(const at::Tensor&, const at::Tensor&, int64_t, int64_t)’
               auto the_result = at::grid_sampler(input, grid, padding_mode);
                                                                           ^
In file included from ../aten/src/ATen/ATen.h:13:0,
                 from ./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:4,
                 from ../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:1:
aten/src/ATen/Functions.h:3589:22: note: declared here
 static inline Tensor grid_sampler(const Tensor & input, const Tensor & grid, int64_t interpolation_mode, 
int64_t padding_mode) {
                      ^
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8.2/memory:79:0,
                 from ../aten/src/ATen/Allocator.h:3,
                 from ../aten/src/ATen/ATen.h:4,
                 from ./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:4,
                 from ../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:1:
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional: In substitution of ‘template<class _Res, class ... _ArgTypes> template<
class _Functor> using _Invoke = decltype (std::__callable_functor(declval<_Functor&>())((declval<_ArgTypes
>)()...)) [with _Functor = std::decay<caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::OperatorDef&, caffe2::
Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660>::type; _Res = bool; _ArgTypes = {}]’:
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional:2334:2:   required by substitution of ‘template<class _Functor> std::fun
ction<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::_Requires<std::__and_<std::__not_<std::is_same<typename std::decay<_Tp>::type,
 std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)> > >, std::__or_<std::is_void<_Tp>, std::is_convertible<std::function<_
Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::_Invoke<typename std::decay<_Tp>::type>, _Res> > >, std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)
>&> std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::operator=(_Functor&&) [with _Functor = _Functor; _Res = bool; _Arg
Types = {}] [with _Functor = caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::OperatorDef&, caffe2::Workspace
*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660]’
./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:8544:18:   required from ‘caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::Op
eratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]’
../caffe2/core/registry.h:131:50:   required from ‘static ObjectPtrType caffe2::Registerer<SrcType, Object
PtrType, Args>::DefaultCreator(Args ...) [with DerivedType = caffe2::ATenOp<caffe2::CPUContext>; SrcType =
 std::basic_string<char>; ObjectPtrType = std::unique_ptr<caffe2::OperatorBase>; Args = {const caffe2::Ope
ratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*}]’
../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:6:1:   required from here
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional:2181:71: error: use of ‘caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::Op
eratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660’ before deduction of ‘aut
o’
  using _Invoke = decltype(__callable_functor(std::declval<_Functor&>())
                                                                       ^
body_text:
Steps to reproduce:

Build Caffe2 (e.g., with python setup_caffe2.py develop) at def3715
Apply 6a55238 Grid sampler: nearest interpolation & reflection padding (#10051) and rebuild

Actual result:
./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:8536:75: error: too few arguments to function ‘at::Tensor at::grid_sampler
(const at::Tensor&, const at::Tensor&, int64_t, int64_t)’
               auto the_result = at::grid_sampler(input, grid, padding_mode);
                                                                           ^
In file included from ../aten/src/ATen/ATen.h:13:0,
                 from ./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:4,
                 from ../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:1:
aten/src/ATen/Functions.h:3589:22: note: declared here
 static inline Tensor grid_sampler(const Tensor & input, const Tensor & grid, int64_t interpolation_mode, 
int64_t padding_mode) {
                      ^
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8.2/memory:79:0,
                 from ../aten/src/ATen/Allocator.h:3,
                 from ../aten/src/ATen/ATen.h:4,
                 from ./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:4,
                 from ../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:1:
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional: In substitution of ‘template<class _Res, class ... _ArgTypes> template<
class _Functor> using _Invoke = decltype (std::__callable_functor(declval<_Functor&>())((declval<_ArgTypes
>)()...)) [with _Functor = std::decay<caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::OperatorDef&, caffe2::
Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660>::type; _Res = bool; _ArgTypes = {}]’:
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional:2334:2:   required by substitution of ‘template<class _Functor> std::fun
ction<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::_Requires<std::__and_<std::__not_<std::is_same<typename std::decay<_Tp>::type,
 std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)> > >, std::__or_<std::is_void<_Tp>, std::is_convertible<std::function<_
Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::_Invoke<typename std::decay<_Tp>::type>, _Res> > >, std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)
>&> std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::operator=(_Functor&&) [with _Functor = _Functor; _Res = bool; _Arg
Types = {}] [with _Functor = caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::OperatorDef&, caffe2::Workspace
*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660]’
./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:8544:18:   required from ‘caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::Op
eratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]’
../caffe2/core/registry.h:131:50:   required from ‘static ObjectPtrType caffe2::Registerer<SrcType, Object
PtrType, Args>::DefaultCreator(Args ...) [with DerivedType = caffe2::ATenOp<caffe2::CPUContext>; SrcType =
 std::basic_string<char>; ObjectPtrType = std::unique_ptr<caffe2::OperatorBase>; Args = {const caffe2::Ope
ratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*}]’
../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:6:1:   required from here
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional:2181:71: error: use of ‘caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::Op
eratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660’ before deduction of ‘aut
o’
  using _Invoke = decltype(__callable_functor(std::declval<_Functor&>())
                                                                       ^
body:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Build Caffe2 (e.g., with `python setup_caffe2.py develop`) at def3715e82475902a4e25a7cd43866dc28bcf5a3
2. Apply 6a55238a3ff4ae3dfdfe5d87cf35d92fcd10bf2a Grid sampler: nearest interpolation & reflection padding (#10051) and rebuild

Actual result:

```
./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:8536:75: error: too few arguments to function ‘at::Tensor at::grid_sampler
(const at::Tensor&, const at::Tensor&, int64_t, int64_t)’
               auto the_result = at::grid_sampler(input, grid, padding_mode);
                                                                           ^
In file included from ../aten/src/ATen/ATen.h:13:0,
                 from ./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:4,
                 from ../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:1:
aten/src/ATen/Functions.h:3589:22: note: declared here
 static inline Tensor grid_sampler(const Tensor & input, const Tensor & grid, int64_t interpolation_mode, 
int64_t padding_mode) {
                      ^
In file included from /usr/include/c++/4.8.2/memory:79:0,
                 from ../aten/src/ATen/Allocator.h:3,
                 from ../aten/src/ATen/ATen.h:4,
                 from ./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:4,
                 from ../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:1:
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional: In substitution of ‘template<class _Res, class ... _ArgTypes> template<
class _Functor> using _Invoke = decltype (std::__callable_functor(declval<_Functor&>())((declval<_ArgTypes
>)()...)) [with _Functor = std::decay<caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::OperatorDef&, caffe2::
Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660>::type; _Res = bool; _ArgTypes = {}]’:
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional:2334:2:   required by substitution of ‘template<class _Functor> std::fun
ction<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::_Requires<std::__and_<std::__not_<std::is_same<typename std::decay<_Tp>::type,
 std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)> > >, std::__or_<std::is_void<_Tp>, std::is_convertible<std::function<_
Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::_Invoke<typename std::decay<_Tp>::type>, _Res> > >, std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)
>&> std::function<_Res(_ArgTypes ...)>::operator=(_Functor&&) [with _Functor = _Functor; _Res = bool; _Arg
Types = {}] [with _Functor = caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::OperatorDef&, caffe2::Workspace
*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660]’
./caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.h:8544:18:   required from ‘caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::Op
eratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]’
../caffe2/core/registry.h:131:50:   required from ‘static ObjectPtrType caffe2::Registerer<SrcType, Object
PtrType, Args>::DefaultCreator(Args ...) [with DerivedType = caffe2::ATenOp<caffe2::CPUContext>; SrcType =
 std::basic_string<char>; ObjectPtrType = std::unique_ptr<caffe2::OperatorBase>; Args = {const caffe2::Ope
ratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*}]’
../caffe2/contrib/aten/aten_op.cc:6:1:   required from here
/usr/include/c++/4.8.2/functional:2181:71: error: use of ‘caffe2::ATenOp<Context>::ATenOp(const caffe2::Op
eratorDef&, caffe2::Workspace*) [with Context = caffe2::CPUContext]::__lambda660’ before deduction of ‘aut
o’
  using _Invoke = decltype(__callable_functor(std::declval<_Functor&>())
                                                                       ^

```
